TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObjectReference

summary.span: 指示当前接口实施者是对另一个对象的引用。

span.span: Indicates that the current interface implementer is a reference to another object.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

span.para: 对当前对象完全还原之前，无法识别的不同对象的引用的对象上实现此接口。在修正阶段的任何对象实现为其实际的查询对象并将该对象插入到关系图。链接地址信息是指完成的引用对象反序列化过程尚未完成的过程。

Implement this interface on objects that are references to a different object, which cannot be resolved until the current object is completely restored. During the fixup stage, any object implementing is queried for its real object and that object is inserted into the graph. Fixup refers to the process of finalizing references not already completed during the object deserialization process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRealObject(valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Function GetRealObject (context As StreamingContext) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 当前对象从其中进行反序列化的 。

span.span: The from which the current object is deserialized.

summary.span: 返回应进行反序列化的真实对象（而不是序列化流指定的对象）。

span.span: Returns the real object that should be deserialized, rather than the object that the serialized stream specifies.

returns.span: 返回放入图形中的实际对象。

span.span: Returns the actual object that is put into the graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可在远程处理的情况下您可以序列化代理创建者对象，而不是实际对象。This method is useful in a remoting situation where you serialize a proxy-creator object, not an actual object. 当代理创建者对象进行反序列化时，反序列化调用其方法。When the proxy-creator object is deserialized, deserialization calls its method. 此时，代理创建者对象创建引用回原始的实际对象，可能在远程计算机上的代理对象的新实例。At this point, the proxy-creator object creates a new instance of the proxy object that refers back to the original actual object, perhaps on a remote computer. 最后，代理创建者对象是丢弃和更高版本被垃圾回收。Finally, the proxy-creator object is discarded and reclaimed later by garbage collection. 例如，考虑如何对象进行序列化。For example, consider how objects are serialized. 而不是从将数据传输对象时，系统将传输具有类型对象和在其中找到一个对象，实现中的程序集的信息的名称的持有者对象。Instead of transmitting the data from the object, the system transmits a holder object with the name of the type object and information on the assembly where it is found in an object implementing . 可用的类型名称和程序集名称时，反序列化基础结构将调用已传输的持有者对象。When both the type name and assembly name are available, the deserialization infrastructure calls on the holder object that has been transmitted. 此持有者返回插入到关系图的对象。This holder returns the object that is inserted into the graph. 此方法受有关与指定。This method is protected by a for the with the specified. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 无法对中等信任的服务器进行调用。

span.span: The call will not work on a medium trusted server.
